text: Shigeharu Aoyama (; born 25 July 1952) is a Japanese politician. He has been a member of the House of Councillors of Japan, since 2016. Aoyama was seen as a possible candidate for the Liberal Democratic Party leadership in the 2024 leadership election. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese economists Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Shigeharu Aoyama
